p: In addition, the stem extract was used to test the susceptibility of R. ferrugineus larvae at the concentrations of 2.8, 4.2, 6.0, 7.0 and 8.0 ppm. Results showed that percentage of mortalities were as follows; 50, 55, 65, 75 and 85, respectively. The concentrations reflected an LC 50 of 2.8 ppm, and LC 95 of 8.9 ppm. The lowest concentration (2.8 ppm) produced 50% mortality, whereas the highest concentration (8 ppm) reflected 85% mortality and the R-square was 0.96.
